name: get_leaderboard_rank
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool binance_futures_leaderboard.
Tool description: Binance Futures Leaderboard API is an API for querying the leaderboard of the Binance Futures Exchange.

Any questions or issues please contact me on Telegram:  [@DevNullZer0](https://t.me/devnullzer0) or via [devnullzer0@proton.me](mailto:devnullzer0@proton.me)
API description: Retrieves the leaderboard rank from the Binance Futures Leaderboard API.

statisticstype.description: The type of statistics to search for.

tradetype.description: The trade type to search for. "PERPETUAL" for USDâ“ˆ-M and "DELIVERY" for COIN-M.

periodtype.description: The period type to search for.
